tool_description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
name: Jet Set Radio API
title: Jet Set Radio API

api_list.name: Graffiti Tags
api_list.description: Returns a list of all Graffiti-Tags

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Possible Values:
 - `asc`
 - `desc`

sortBy must be present for this to take effect. 
The default value is `asc`

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of items returned in the response.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description:
Possible Values:
Any field on the document

Examples:
 - name
 - stats
